title: How to turn off screenshot noise
content:
Where is the option to turn off screenshot noises?
I have set system notifications to silent and turned off my shutter sound in the camera app, for what that's worth.
I do not want to turn off the notification altogether. I just want it silenced or at least quieter.
They are silent when I am in DND, so clearly I'm not in a country where this is illegal or something. It is both inconvenient and ridiculous to turn on DND every time I want to take a screenshot.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3a
